# sampled


```{r}
require(magrittr); require(plyr)
a <- read.csv("VolleyballFlags.csv") %>% mutate(Area = ifelse(Location == "n", "S", "N"))
with(a, table(Count, Area)) %>% t %>%  barplot(legend.text = TRUE, beside = TRUE)
  
glm.null <- glm(Count ~ 1, family = "poisson", data = a) 
glm.location <- glm(Count ~ Area, family = "poisson", data = a) 
  
AIC(glm.null, glm.location)
```

```{r}
predict(glm.location, newdata = data.frame(Area = c("S","N")), se.fit = TRUE)
```
